title: How to Make Seasoned Salt

steps.headline: Pour into an air-tight container with a lid.
Use when required.
steps.description: It goes well in dips, salad dressings, soups and on sandwiches.

steps.headline: Grind the ingredients together in a mortar and pestle.
Transfer to a storage container as needed.

text: Making a Mix Mix the ingredients together thoroughly.  Pour into an air-tight container with a lid. Seal. Use when required. It goes well in dips, salad dressings, soups and on sandwiches. Using a Mortar and Pestle Grind the ingredients together in a mortar and pestle.  Transfer to a storage container as needed.
